key_risks: Intense competition from established players and emerging FinTech startups
Evolving regulatory requirements across multiple jurisdictions
Client concentration risks with significant revenue tied to a limited number of large clients
Ongoing risks of data breaches and cyberattacks
High dependency on recurring subscription-based revenue
controversies: Earnings miss in Q2 2024 leading to stock price decline
Insider selling activity raising investor concerns
Legal investigations by multiple law firms following earnings miss and stock price decline
social_issues: Cybersecurity threats undermining client trust and leading to financial losses
High dependency on subscription-based revenue posing risks if client retention or market demand declines
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance challenges and the need to improve T+1 settlement processes
Insider selling activity raising governance concerns
